description: Lists the capacity tasks for your Amazon Web Services account. Use filters to return specific results. If you specify multiple filters, the results include only the resources that match all of the specified filters. For a filter where you can specify multiple values, the results include items that match any of the values that you specify for the filter.

parameters.name: CapacityTaskStatusFilter
parameters.description: A list of statuses. For example, REQUESTED or WAITING_FOR_EVACUATION. (string) ---

nested_items.name: CapacityTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the specified capacity task.

nested_items.name: OutpostId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Outpost associated with the specified capacity task.

nested_items.name: OrderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Outposts order of the host associated with the capacity task.

nested_items.name: AssetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset. An Outpost asset can be a single server within an Outposts rack or an Outposts server configuration.

nested_items.name: CapacityTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the capacity task.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date that the specified capacity task was created.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date that the specified capacity task successfully ran.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the specified capacity was last modified.
